product_name: The North Face Carli Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: On rainy days, explore the city in comfort in The North Face Carli Rain Jacket for women. HyVent(R) fabric offers you waterproof, windproof and breathable protection. Stylish longer length provides plenty of coverage. Center-front zipper is protected by a snap placket. Dual-entry hand pockets feature top flaps with button closures and welt-zippered side pockets. The North Face Carli Rain Jacket has an adjustable drawcord hood and self-fabric button tabs at sleeves. Internal media pocket with cord guide; embroidered logo at left chest and back right shoulder.
short_description: On rainy days, explore the city in comfort in The North Face Carli Rain Jacket for women. HyVent(R) fabric offers you waterproof, windproof and breathable protection.
